title: I Like My Sweaters Elevated and Upscale—33 Finds that Hit the Spot
excerpt: From classic crewneck to trend-forward scarf sweaters, we're sharing the most elevated and upscale sweaters to shop this winter.
text: I consider myself a down-to-earth person, but I'll admit that I'm a real snob when it comes to sweaters. I like them luxe-looking, luxe-feeling, comfortable, soft, chic, elevated, and upscale. Not too much to ask, is it? That's not to say I want to spend my entire paycheck on one. Luckily, as you'll see below, a chic-looking sweater need not cost a fortune.Since sweaters are at the forefront of my wardrobe right now, I've been looking to add some chic new styles into the mix. Not only classic silhouettes, but also trend-forward knits with elevated details such as a scarf-sweater, or an hourglass silhouette that feels fresh and of the moment. If you love a beautiful sweater as much as I do, then keep scrolling for my favorite sweaters on the internet right now that are worth adding to your wardrobe this season. There's something for every budget. ZARA Wool Blend Scarf Sweater A chic scarf-sweater that won't break the bank. madewell Cashmere V-Neck Sweater Lean into this season's rich dark-brown hues. j.crew Cashmere Relaxed Crewneck Sweater I personally own this and just love the relaxed fit and luxe feel. Nordstrom High Low Mock Neck Fisherman Sweater Add elegance to your winter look. A stunning Fair Isle sweater to add to your arsenal. Shopbop Jenni Kayne Cooper Cardigan An investment piece you won't regret. The quality is premium and the fit is perfection. j.crew Cashmere Relaxed V-Neck Sweater It's all about burgundy hues this season. Babaton Atticus Merino Wool Sweater The sweater that will transition from day to night seamlessly. The color is beautiful—and surprisingly versatile. uniqlo Cable V-Neck Sweater A great find for under $50. An elevated of-the-moment silhouette. H&M Fine-Knit Collared Sweater Style with chic dark wash jeans. ZARA High Collar Knit Sweater My favorite new weekend sweater. Nordstrom Rib V-Neck Sweater Go for a head-to-toe winter white look. Gap Cashsoft Cropped Cardigan Gap's Cashsoft pieces are incredibly comfortable. Chloé vibes. Zara prices. A very chic hourglass silhouette. ZARA 100% Wool Knit Scarf Top An sleek scarf top in a gorgeous color. Treasure & Bond Oversize V-Neck Sweater Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater This under $100 cashmere sweater is a WWW best-seller. Gap Cashsoft Relaxed Polo Sweater This would look great with relaxed white jeans. Shopbop 4th & Reckless Gabriel Sweater Can you tell I'm loving scarf sweaters right now? Aritzia Reconnect Merino Wool T-Shirt COS Merino Wool Turtleneck Sweater Style with jeans and mini skirts alike. H&M Fine-Knit Mock Turtleneck Sweater Caslon Collar Organic Cotton Blend Cardigan Navy blue hues are having a moment this season. Arket Super Soft Alpaca Relaxed Sweater MANGO Fine Knit Sweater With Buttons The button neckline looks so chic. Rebecca Taylor Novelty Wool Peplum Cardi I just got this and its beautiful for day or night.
html:
I consider myself a down-to-earth person, but I'll admit that I'm a real snob when it comes to sweaters. I like them luxe-looking, luxe-feeling, comfortable, soft, chic, elevated, and upscale. Not too much to ask, is it? That's not to say I want to spend my entire paycheck on one. Luckily, as you'll see below, a chic-looking sweater need not cost a fortune.

Since sweaters are at the forefront of my wardrobe right now, I've been looking to add some chic new styles into the mix. Not only classic silhouettes, but also trend-forward knits with elevated details such as a scarf-sweater, or an hourglass silhouette that feels fresh and of the moment. If you love a beautiful sweater as much as I do, then keep scrolling for my favorite sweaters on the internet right now that are worth adding to your wardrobe this season. There's something for every budget.

ZARA

Wool Blend Scarf Sweater

A chic scarf-sweater that won't break the bank.

madewell

Cashmere V-Neck Sweater

Lean into this season's rich dark-brown hues.

j.crew

Cashmere Relaxed Crewneck Sweater

I personally own this and just love the relaxed fit and luxe feel.

High Low Mock Neck Fisherman Sweater

Add elegance to your winter look.

A stunning Fair Isle sweater to add to your arsenal.

Jenni Kayne Cooper Cardigan

An investment piece you won't regret. The quality is premium and the fit is perfection.

It's all about burgundy hues this season.

The sweater that will transition from day to night seamlessly.

The color is beautiful—and surprisingly versatile.

A great find for under $50.

An elevated of-the-moment silhouette.

Style with chic dark wash jeans.

Go for a head-to-toe winter white look.

Gap's Cashsoft pieces are incredibly comfortable.

A very chic hourglass silhouette.
